column4: The date that the publisher accepted the  resource into their system
The date the resource is made publicly  available.
The specific, documented date at which the  resource receives a copyrighted status; if  applicable.
A (representative) date at which the resource  content was collected.
A rough indication of the resource's time coverage (deprecated in favour of Collected)
The date the resource itself was put together
The date that the resource was created (deprecated in favour of Created)
The date that the resource is published or  distributed e.g. to a data center
The date the creator submits the resource to the publisher. This could be different from Accepted if the publisher then applies a  selection process.
The date of the last update to the resource;  when the resource is being added to.
A date on which the resource was updated (deprecated in favour of Updated)
A date of validitiy.  This is probably not useful in the VOResource context.

Dates with this role indicate when the resource has last undergone a non-formal inspection, typically by a human, as to whether it is still working as expectable, both technically and as regards science content.
